about_the_game:
Buggos 2 is a horde based auto-battler where you play as the evil sentient hivemind controlling the swarm. The Buggos are expendable and nearly endless, and many of them will need to be sacrificed to destroy the disgusting human menace. Prepare to control up to 5000 Buggos!

Every mission you complete will strengthen the swarm. Spend evolution points to gain permanent upgrades that enhance your fighting ability. Unlock new bugs that specialize in building, swarming, tanking, or exploding the enemy to bits.

Battle the humans by swarming endlessly over the battle field. Take over strategic objectives that multiply the spawning rate of your hives. Wash over the human forces with wave after wave of Buggo flesh.

The humans will also gain new technology and weapons to fight back as you progress though the campaign. However you can use their own technology against them. Each planet you conquer will provide you a random choice of evolutionary upgrades based on the humans technology.

Demo for Buggos 2 Coming soon! Please Wishlist and check back often so you can provide feedback.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H (the game is CPU hungry - more is better)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060

short_description: Conquer and destroy the dirty Humans by sending swarms of bugs to crush their home worlds. Evolve your Buggos intro stronger, faster, more murderous creatures that can rip the Human defenses to shreds! No one can stop your evolutionary powers. You are the evil Buggo Hivemind!!!
